name: How They Survived
description:
What if dinos survived the meteorite cataclysm? How would have they fared against humans? Protect the egg to keep them alive up to today!

Developed for the Ludum Dare Jame 46 with the theme keep it alive.

Controls

Mouse mandatory!

Mouse move: Movement
Left Click: Bite
Hold Left Click: Grab

Try to throw away grabbed enemies or rocks as projectiles.

Have Fun!

We hope you'll have as much fun as we did when we created this game :)

-The Gůntlemen
